Subject: CAP Repot Flooding
Description: We have a denylist that has been working fine. Today, I check the logs and there is so many Content Threat Blocked for Facebook.com. It shows the majoiry for a user we have, and it also shows for me. I am not even visiting facebook and the user isnt visiting facebook too. How can we stop the spam from showing up, this didn't happen before.
What_We_Know__c: We had a remote session in which we could not reproduce the reported issue, but the customer preferred to leave the ticket open for a few days and get the commands to generate EPP client logs to capture the behavior.
Next_Steps__c: Waiting for the customer to generate and attach the logs for the reported issue.
Solution_Comment__c: Customer confirmed that the ticket can be closed.
